Hello:

I hope this is this question is the appropriate place to pose this 
quesiton.  Apologies in advance if not.

I am developing a Java application which needs to automate user GUI 
interaction with an existing
Java-based GUI app.  THe app runs continuously and its GUI appearance 
is not predictable (different GUIs
may appear during different runs of the app).  That said, the GUIs 
are fairly simple with most having an
"OK" or "Cancel" button.  My quesiton is:

1)WOuld using Java GUI Testing tools be a viable option for this 
task?  I don't know enough about them
to judge right off.  My final applicaiton would need to run as a 
standalone app but also with the capability of an external user
to start and stop the app.  I looked into using the Java Robot class 
but it seems like it would lock the mouse/keyboard in the case
of an app like mine which will run continuously.

2)If the answer to the quesiton above is yes..which Java GUI tool 
would be most suitable for this task?

Thanks in advance.

-D
